description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end and roof extension to rear (main) roof slope and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope; alteration to external elevation
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Proposed Ground and First Floor Plans drawing no.01, Proposed Revised Loft Floor Plans drawing no.02 dated 15/4/2021, Proposed Revised Elevations drawing no.03 dated 15/4/2021, Proposed Revised Side Elevations drawing no.04 dated 15/4/2021 and Proposed Revised Section drawing no.05 dated 15/4/2021
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match those of the existing property unless indicated on the approved plans or application form.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), London Plan (2021) policies D3, D3 and HC1 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019) - sections 12 and 16.
| The proposed rooflights shall be "conservation style" and not protrude more than 150mm from the roofslope.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with the St Marks and Canal Conservation Area Management Plan, policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the  London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
| No new openings to the extension hereby approved shall be incorporated without prior written confirmation from the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D1, D4 and of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
